name: gitlab_run_job
description: Run/play a manual or retryable job in GitLab. Use this tool to trigger manual jobs or retry failed jobs. The job must be in a playable state (manual, failed, or canceled).

project_id.description: The GitLab project ID or URL-encoded path (e.g., 'mygroup/myproject' or '12345'). Required to identify the project.

job_id.description: The job ID to run/play. You can get this from gitlab_get_pipeline_jobs tool.

id.description: The job ID that was triggered

status.description: The updated job status after triggering (typically 'pending' or 'running')

stage.description: The pipeline stage this job belongs to

web_url.description: URL to view the job in GitLab
